divs: sighting detailsi was driving north on argentine rd in early afternoon on a clear autumn day, with my 10 year old daughter and 12 year old step-daughter in the back seat. suddenly, my step-daughter said "what is that?" as she looked east out her window. i could not see the object from my position, so i lowered my head and slowed down. i could see a very bright sliver of movement above the trees to the east, approx 1\2 mile away. i pulled over to the side of the road, and got out of the car. the three of us witnessed a very very large silver disc moving slowly above the trees,heading north. this object was impossibly large; i would say it had to be 300-500 feet wide. i am 5'5" tall, and spread my arms out wide; it was as wide as that from where i stood. it was so bright it was hard to look at without sunglasses. (which we were all wearing) then, the object suddenly accelerated north at great speed. we all jumped back into the car and raced north to see how far it would go. we lost sight of it almost immediately . 10 miles ahead, we saw a group of people standing in the road, and we stopped to see what was going on. the people there had been observing this same craft for over an hour, and had stationed a watcher 15 miles back at m-59, who had a walkie-talkie; where they were communicating with each other on the location of the craft. according to the group, the craft had been moving at high rates of speed. the man at m-59 would report to the man stationed 15 miles north when he saw the craft zoom north again; the man 15 miles north reported that several times the craft had made the 15 mile trip in 6.5 seconds. we stood and watched this craft with the local police for over an hour, until it suddenly stopped, then zoomed straight up, and was gone. by the time it departed, there were approx 50 people standing there.
Summary: Enormous silver disc flying at impossible speeds above tree line.
